description: Create an API key in your Famulor account and paste the value here. Get API key here -> https://app.famulor.de.

actions.name: addLead
actions.description: Add a lead to an outbound campaign to be called by an AI assistant.

actions.name: campaignControl
actions.description: Start or stop an outbound calling campaign. Starting requires sufficient leads; stopping cancels ongoing calls.

actions.name: deleteLead
actions.description: ⚠️ Permanently delete a lead from the system. This action cannot be undone and will abort any ongoing calls.

actions.name: makePhoneCall
actions.description: Initiate an AI-powered phone call to a customer using a selected assistant.

actions.name: sendSms
actions.description: Send an SMS message using your purchased phone numbers. Costs are automatically deducted from your account.

triggers.name: getAssistants
triggers.description: Triggers when AI assistants are created or updated in your Famulor account.

triggers.name: inboundCall
triggers.description: Triggers when an inbound call is received by your AI assistant. Webhook must be enabled for the selected assistant.

triggers.name: phoneCallEnded
triggers.description: Triggers when a phone call is completed, providing full call transcript, extracted variables, and call metadata.
